bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: Broken link in doc home page
bug.description:
Submit job from VS code page is 404, and need to be updated with the new extension. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/52046993-0bc64f00-2583-11e9-80f8-1ca3267cf2b8.png></denchmark-link>
when click on this link, it got a 404. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-tools-for-ai/blob/master/docs/quickstart-05-pai.md>https://github.com/Microsoft/vscode-tools-for-ai/blob/master/docs/quickstart-05-pai.md</denchmark-link>
